resources.string: Note: Username should be at least 4 characters long and password should be at least 6 characters long
Username should be at least 4 characters long
Password should be at least 6 characters long
Password must contain at least 1 uppercase character
Password must contain at least 1 lowercase character
Password must contain at least 1 digit character
Password must contain at least one of [!@#$%^&*] characters
